fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.description: The foundation for all physical builds, versatile in weapons and armor.

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.description: Basic fighter type, focused on physical toughness and raw damage.

mercenary.name: Mercenary
mercenary.description: Specialist in reputation, commissions, and equipment access.

wizard_slayer.name: Wizard Slayer
wizard_slayer.description: A specialist fighter against all spell casters, highly resistant to magic.

pit_fighter.name: Pit Fighter
pit_fighter.description: Melee and unarmed oriented fighter sponsored with good starting gear.

bushi.name: Bushi
bushi.description: A wandering fighter from the eastern lands, focused on discipline.

kensai.name: Kensai
kensai.description: An armorless fighter specializing in high evasion and parrying for defense.

knight.name: Knight
knight.description: Adheres to strict ethical codes; foundation for noble warriors.

cavalier.name: Cavalier
cavalier.description: Noble-born knight, from high born families, typically a squire for another knight.

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.description: A holy warrior adhering to a strict code of conduct.

undead_hunter.name: Undead Hunter
undead_hunter.description: Specialized holy warrior dedicated solely to fighting the undead.

crusader.name: Crusader
crusader.description: A commissioned warrior, dedicated to a cause rather than a noble lineage.

valkyrie.name: Valkyrie
valkyrie.description: Female warriors on a divine mission.

death_knight.name: Death Knight
death_knight.description: An evil knight, gaining power through unholy beliefs.

samurai.name: Samurai
samurai.description: Warrior specializing in Japanese armor and weapon types (Katana, Wakizashi).

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.description: Tracking, scouting, and forest survival expert.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: Ranger specialization focused on debilitating critical hits.

archer.name: Archer
archer.description: Highly specialized in bows and missile weapon mastery.

beastmaster.name: Beastmaster
beastmaster.description: Ranger who uses bonded pets for combat and scouting.

trapper_stalker.name: Trapper/Stalker
trapper_stalker.description: Ranger focused on stealth and traps; increased combat initiative.

barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.description: Hardy, high life warriors who eschew heavier armor for raw strength.

nomad.name: Nomad
nomad.description: Barbarian variant from cold wastelands. Wanderer. Travels in packs.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.description: Wild warrior with low armor, but high damage absorption and attack rate.

arcane_mage.name: Mages/Magic Users
arcane_mage.description: General spell caster, specializing in destructive arcane magic.

wujen.name: Wu-jen
wujen.description: Asian spell caster with some martial arts knowledge and additional weaponry.

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: Female variant with a focus on elemental or curse magic.

summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.description: Masters of conjuration, able to pull entities and objects from other planes.

necromancer.name: Necromancer
necromancer.description: Focuses on undead, death, and life drain magic.

warlock.name: Warlock
warlock.description: Focuses on demons and the unnatural through portal magic.

conjurer.name: Conjurer
conjurer.description: General summoner; bring to life swords, objects or basic creatures.

mental.name: Mental
mental.description: Uses deception, tricks of the mind or a '3rd eye' for psychic abilities.

illusionist.name: Illusionist
illusionist.description: Uses deception and tricks of the mind. Effects can be nullified through higher intellect.

psionics.name: Psionics
psionics.description: Mind manipulation specialist. Defenses are WIL-based.

physical.name: Physical
physical.description: A caster whose power manifests in physical, rather than purely magical, effects.

geomancer.name: Geomancer
geomancer.description: Physical spell caster/warrior using earth summons, buffs and dealing physical damage.

alchemist.name: Alchemist
alchemist.description: Uses potions, thrown objects, and chemical concoctions for damage and buffs.

cleric.name: Clerics
cleric.description: Standard pious worshipper; gains divine powers through belief/deity.

priest.name: Priest
priest.description: Standard pious worshipper; gains powers through belief/deity.

druid.name: Druid
druid.description: Forest priest specializing in nature and elemental magic.

shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
shapeshifter.description: Druid specialization with the ability to manifest as woodland beings.

fanatic.name: Fanatic
fanatic.description: Blindly zealous type; low willpower but high pain threshold.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: Pious warriors who mix divine power with martial skill.

templar.name: Templar
templar.description: Beliefs provide weapon and defense infusion buffs.

sohei.name: Sohei
sohei.description: Protectors of temples; Asian martial arts background.

monk.name: Monk
monk.description: Unarmed combat specialist who prefers peaceful approach; high evasion.

spirit.name: Spirit
spirit.description: Practitioners who draw power from ancestral spirits, totems, and curses.

shaman.name: Shaman
shaman.description: Uses totems and spirits; common among humanoid races (goblins, kobolds).

witch_doctor.name: Witch Doctor
witch_doctor.description: Summoner type with chanting; humanoid creatures are inclined for this.

shukenja.name: Shukenja
shukenja.description: Asian priest with martial arts background and weaponry; focused on purification.

thief.name: Thieves
thief.description: The archetypal stealth class, focused on larceny, traps, and exploration.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: An all-around thief, versatile in most underground skills.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.description: Specializes in kleptomania and acquiring money/items from NPCs.

beggar.name: Beggar
beggar.description: Poor character with high street sense and survival skills.

pirate.name: Pirate
pirate.description: Navigator of the seas, skilled in ship combat and swashbuckling.

assassin.name: Poison/Critical Hit
assassin.description: Focuses on killing through poisons and targeting vital points for critical damage.

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.description: Specializes in the art of ninjitsu, combining stealth, speed, and specialized weapons.

agility_fighter.name: Agility Fighter
agility_fighter.description: Less focused on thieving and more focused on finesse fighting, parrying and evasion.

brigand.name: Brigand
brigand.description: Rough fighter type who is more of an outlaw, fights with missile weapons.

swashbuckler.name: Swashbuckler
swashbuckler.description: High initiative fighter type with good parry and high evasion skills.

acrobat.name: Acrobat
acrobat.description: High evasion fighter that uses tumbling to counter attack.

entertainer.name: Entertainer / Info
entertainer.description: Gains lore, some access to limited spells, and uses performance skills.

bard_lark.name: Bard/Lark
bard_lark.description: Singer, uses instruments, limited fighting, evasion based.

juggler.name: Juggler
juggler.description: High evasion, limited fighting, performs simple illusions.

yakuza.name: Yakuza
yakuza.description: Gains money through info; limited thieving; can have targeted, offscreen assassinations.

tinker.name: Tinker
tinker.description: High weapon/armor lore. Better fighter with high evasion/parrying attacks.
